feed.title: MetaFilter Deleted Posts
feed.subtitle: Posts. That have been deleted. From MetaFilter.

entry.title: In the weeds.
entry.content:
Post 188911 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: So ... not really seeing what makes this worth a post? This author / instructor person basically did what she said she would in the large print, apparently? And one lesser known media source seems to be reporting the misdemeanor charge? (can't read it from where I am.) If there's something that makes this more significant than it appears, please contact us! Thanks. -- taz
entry.summary: Post 188911 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: So ... not really seeing what makes this worth a post? This author / instructor person basically did what she said she would in the large print, apparently? And one lesser known media source seems to be reporting the misdemeanor charge? (can't read it from where I am.) If there's something that makes this more significant than it appears, please contact us! Thanks. -- taz
